title: Birthday Package
seo_description: Celebrate your special day in style with a birthday cake and toast of sparkling wine for two
short_description:
Celebrate your special day in style with a birthday cake and toast of sparkling wine for two, upon arrival! Of course, complimentary Wine Country breakfast is included every morning, and Friday and Saturday evenings our guests enjoy a complimentary wine and cheese tasting served in the Winery House, hosted by a local vintner.

Package Includes:

  • Chilled split of sparkling wine in your room upon arrival 
  • Birthday cake for two in your room upon arrival
  • Wine Country Breakfast each morning
  • Weekend Wine Tasting served in the Winery House hosted by a local vintner
